skill.name: iso-13485-certification
skill.description: Comprehensive toolkit for preparing ISO 13485 certification documentation for medical device Quality Management Systems. Use when users need help with ISO 13485 QMS documentation, including (1) conducting gap analysis of existing documentation, (2) creating Quality Manuals, (3) developing required procedures and work instructions, (4) preparing Medical Device Files, (5) understanding ISO 13485 requirements, or (6) identifying missing documentation for medical device certification. Also use when users mention medical device regulations, QMS certification, FDA QMSR, EU MDR, or need help with quality system documentation.
skill.summary: Comprehensive toolkit for preparing ISO 13485 certification documentation for medical device Quality...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No credential access, environment harvesting, or network exfiltration patterns were found. The only executable script performs local file scanning for keywords and outputs a report.

content.value_statement: Medical device teams struggle to build compliant QMS documentation. This skill provides structured guidance, checklists, and templates to accelerate ISO 13485 preparation.
actual_capabilities: Runs a local gap analysis script against a user document folder
Lists required ISO 13485 procedures and key documents
Supplies a Quality Manual template and drafting guide
Supplies CAPA and document control procedure templates
limitations: Gap analyzer only reads full text for TXT and MD files
Does not extract content from PDF or DOC files
Does not provide legal certification or audit sign off
Requires a user supplied document directory for analysis

use_cases.title: Build QMS from scratch
use_cases.description: Create a Quality Manual and key procedures using structured templates and clause guidance.

use_cases.title: Run a documentation gap check
use_cases.description: Scan existing documents to identify missing ISO 13485 procedures and key records.

use_cases.title: Prepare audit readiness
use_cases.description: Use checklists and references to verify QMS coverage before certification audits.

prompt_templates.title: Get started
prompt_templates.prompt: We are starting ISO 13485. Outline the first five documents to create and explain why they come first.

prompt_templates.title: Gap analysis plan
prompt_templates.prompt: We have a QMS document folder. Explain how to run the gap analyzer and how to interpret the results.

prompt_templates.title: Quality Manual help
prompt_templates.prompt: Using the template, list the key company details I must gather before drafting the Quality Manual.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced CAPA
prompt_templates.prompt: Customize the CAPA procedure template for a Class II device manufacturer with outsourced sterilization.

output_examples.input: Summarize our top ISO 13485 gaps based on missing procedures
output: Missing CAPA, complaint handling, and internal audit procedures
Quality Manual not identified in the document set
Priority focus should start with document control and record control

best_practices: Replace all placeholders in templates before approval
Justify exclusions clearly in the Quality Manual
Use the checklist to verify every clause before audit
anti_patterns: Copy ISO 13485 text without describing real processes
Mark procedures complete without evidence records
Skip document control and record control until late

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill is text and template based and works across Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the main limits of the gap analyzer?
faq.answer: It reads TXT and MD file content only and uses filename matching for other formats.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my document system?
faq.answer: Yes. Export documents to a folder and point the analyzer to that directory.

faq.question: Does it access or transmit my data?
faq.answer: No. The script performs local scanning and does not make network calls.

faq.question: What if the analyzer finds no documents?
faq.answer: Verify the folder path and file extensions, then rerun the command.

faq.question: How does this compare to a consultant?
faq.answer: It provides templates and checklists but does not replace expert review or certification advice.
